column4: hey guys, i'm a linux noob and i'm not really sure where i need to go for help. i can't tell if my terminal window is currently still running my command or is frozen, i've typed a command and it hasn't returned a completion or failure. is this a good place to ask, and can anyone help?
theres some  way to make dd print out a progress report via a second shell. but ive never done it.
i thin i saw it mentioned on askubuntu and the other day when i was googling for 'dd progress'
